section.name: Beige-Accounting start not from scratch.
section.p: In real life a user usually starts to use an accounting software when he/she already has been doing his/her business. Assuming that Bob start to use Beige Accounting at 21 Jan 2016 with the same (as describing early) accounting results. He used single entry accounting software, he just write records in Excel. So results is:

As you can see only Rob's wage and taxes are liabilities and Bob's income tax expenses i.e. they should be recorded as symmetric double entries. All others is recorded as single asymmetric entry. To record Inventory you should use document Beginning Inventory.
